WorkItem.Description:
1. Create a new hun module.
2. Equip any ranged weapon you like.
3. Go to 'Options -> Pet Talents' tab, the default of 'Pet Family' is cat, and change 'Cobra reflexes' to 2.
(Yes, it did increace Pet DPS.)
4. Change 'Pet Family' to wolf, and change 'Cobra reflexes' to 2.
(Pet DPS doesn't increase anymore now.)
Â 
Rawr 2.3.4 @ Win 7
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Change pet family then pet DPS errors
